name: market for bauxite | bauxite | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3828/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'bauxite', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'bauxite',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'bauxite',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/07:Mining of metal ores/072:Mining of non-ferrous metal ores/0729:Mining of other non-ferrous metal ores

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Transport data from IAI's 2010 LCI survey. Response rate for transport was 20%.

flow.name: bauxite
flow.category: B:Mining and quarrying/07:Mining of metal ores/072:Mining of non-ferrous metal ores/0729:Mining of other non-ferrous metal ores

exchanges.description: Calculated using the total Bauxite transport (in tkm/t alumina) divided by the Amount bauxite (t/t alumina), as found in the International Aluminium Institute's report of the 2010 LCI survey.
